ApiVersionToken.description:
It would be nicer if versions could be numbers, but Typescript has no
concept of union types for numbers.

description:
The properties of a project that can be queried from the
server when asking for all available projecs.

This is a stripped down version of all possibly
existing project properties that is used to list available
projects.

apiVersion.description:
These API versions are merely a number, no need to overcomplicate things.
If versions differ, any implementing the API is free to specify
version ranges it works with.
